Injector Plate.__comment: If no discharge coefficient is provided, program will generate one

Nitrous Tank._comment: Temperature, Pressure, and Volume are in [psig], and [L]
Nitrous Tank.__comment: Fluid naming for PropsSI -> CO2 or NITROUSOXIDE

Combustion Chamber._comment: init-T and -P are cold flow values, steady-T and -P are static fire values
Combustion Chamber.__comment: 55L tank at Rothney, temperatures in deg C, pressures in psig
